description: When Jax finds out that his fiance's brother is coming into town, he's ready to keep an open mind, but when Paul Canon shows up on the door soaking wet in his underwear he has to know more. Paul can't wait to welcome Jax into the family, he doesn't even mind when he catches Jax jerking off to a sneaky picture he took of him naked! Paul decides to take Jax deep into Paulville, giving him a sloppy blowjob in the bathroom and letting him take a ride on his tight ass in the shower. The two horny hunks will do whatever it takes to keep their little affair from Jax's fiance, even letting Jax get soaked in a cold shower. The water isn't enough to kill Jax's boner though and soon the two studs are banging it out in the bedroom, Jax giving Paul the deep dicking down that only someone about to get married can!
title: The Prodigal Stud Returns
